title: Internal roads, pathways, common amenities etc
clause_text: Internal roads, pathways, common amenities etc. as shown in the layout of the colony shall be provided as part of the original project. However the Co-operative Housing Society shall be responsible for maintaining the same.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
